# Overview
Finalize dataframe of predictors


Check missing data
Figure for missing data

Combine LC, Fisl, and ORG data

# Packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

# Data 

```{r}
lc_predictors = read_csv("../outputs/2025-08-31_Cleaned_DF/2025-10-03_LC_site_Predictors.csv")

lc_id = read_csv("../outputs/LCC_cleaned/csv/2025-11-18_LC_Site_fullCombustionID.csv")

lc_fri = read_csv("../outputs/2025-08-18_cleaned/csv/2025-11-18_LC_Site_FRI.csv")

```



# View Data

```{r}
lc_predictors
lc_id
lc_fri
```


# join Data
```{r}
( fieldStandAge = lc_id %>% dplyr::select(site_ID, standAge) %>% rename(ID = site_ID) )
```

```{r}
( lc = lc_predictors %>%
  full_join(fieldStandAge, by = "ID") %>%
    full_join(lc_fri, by = "ID") %>%
    relocate(ID, project, site, lat, lon, fireYr) %>%
    dplyr::select(-ID_plot_list, -LandCover, -row_id) %>%
    rename(fieldAge = standAge)
)
```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
write.csv(lc, "../outputs/LCC_cleaned/csv/2025-11-18_LC_site_SpatialData.csv", row.names=F)
```
